name: Len'en Mugenri ~ Misremembered Memories v0.50a
description:
A PC-98 Styled Len'en Project Fangame created solely by me.
Demo features a full length extra boss fight against Tsurubami Senri with 14 spell cards and 11 nonspells, full replay support, a spell practice system, and entirely original danmaku.

Credits:
Mugenri (me) - Programming, Art, Music, Scenario
